episode: I found out my boyfriend is going on vacation without me.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I found out that my boyfriend is going on vacation without me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be really hurtful and frustrating for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is so very

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like you're feeling pretty left out and upset.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: what do you recommend

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Talk to him about how you feel, maybe there's a reason you weren't included.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am very frustrated and feel left out.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable, feels like he's prioritizing something else over you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: are there ways I should bring this up that would be best?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Choose a calm moment, use "I" statements, express feelings, avoid blaming him.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: what if it is because he wants to break up

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a tough possibility, be prepared for an honest conversation, but also take care of yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am not ready to have the conversation, what should I do

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take some time to process your emotions, reflect on what you want to say and how you feel.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: that might be a good idea, what about other ideas?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Write down your thoughts, talk to a trusted friend or family member for support.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will think about that

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take all the time you need, prioritize your own emotional well-being.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: thank you for helping me

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, feel free to talk more if you need to.
